text: Umusambanyikazi n’umusambanyi (batari bashaka), buri wese mujye mumukubita inkoni ijana. Kandi ntimuzabagirire impuhwe igihe mushyira mu bikorwa itegeko rya Allah niba koko mwemera Allah n’umunsi w’imperuka. Ndetse (ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’icyo gihano cyabo rijye ryitabirwa n’itsinda ry’abemera)
